name: untitled fruit game prototype
description:
this is a prototype for a game i want to release before quarantine is over! 

you control a fruit (large sphere) that you control by tilting the cutting board (brown rect) with wasd or arrow keys. your goal is to collect power-ups (small spheres) and avoid falling knives (black rects). once you've collected enough power-ups, you're able to knock away fallen knives for a bit.

in very early development! please comment any suggestions for future features :)

you can see my running checklist for features and bugfixes here.

thanks for playing!
